# Steinbach, Wartburgkreis

|state        = Thuringia
|district         = Wartburgkreis

Steinbach () is a village and former municipality in the Wartburgkreis district of Thuringia, Germany. Since 31 December 2012, it is part of Bad Liebenstein.
